title.rendered: Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment on Tu Hoa, Tay Ho

content.rendered: Experience luxury living in Tu Hoa with this serviced 1-bedroom apartment boasting a balcony and a fantastic landlord. Enjoy premium amenities and personalized service in one of Hanoi’s most prestigious neighborhoods. Perfect for professionals or couples seeking comfort and convenience.
